solution_line_template: After his mom took {mom_took_chocolates} chocolates, Alix has now {alix_initial_chocolates} - {mom_took_chocolates} = <<{alix_initial_chocolates}-{mom_took_chocolates}={alix_remaining_chocolates}>>{alix_remaining_chocolates} chocolate.
So Alix has {alix_remaining_chocolates} - {nick_chocolates} = <<{alix_remaining_chocolates}-{nick_chocolates}={alix_more_than_nick}>>{alix_more_than_nick} chocolates more than Nick.
